projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Personal portfolio built with FastAPI and Jinja2 templates, featuring JSON-based storage and admin interface. Includes responsive design, contact forms, and dynamic content management.

projects.title: E-Commerce API Platform
projects.description: RESTful API for e-commerce platform with user authentication, product management, order processing, and payment integration. Built with FastAPI and PostgreSQL.

projects.title: Task Management Dashboard
projects.description: Modern task management web application with real-time updates, team collaboration features, and analytics dashboard. Built with React frontend and FastAPI backend.

projects.title: Weather Analytics API
projects.description: Weather data aggregation and analytics API that collects data from multiple sources, processes historical weather patterns, and provides forecasting insights.

projects.title: Social Media Content Scheduler
projects.description: Automated social media content scheduling platform with multi-platform support, analytics tracking, and AI-powered content suggestions.

projects.title: Real Estate Property Finder
projects.description: Property search and listing platform with advanced filtering, map integration, virtual tours, and mortgage calculator features.
